name: spectre
description: Spec-driven development for Claude Code. Write specs, implement them, verify them with AI reasoning.
author: mikaelweiss

commands.name: spec-create
commands.description: Create a new spec through guided ideation

commands.name: spec-implement
commands.description: Implement a spec and verify it passes

commands.name: spec-test
commands.description: Test specs to verify they are satisfied
